name: Alma del Pacifico Beach Hotel & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I wish to echo the comments of the last few reviewers: this place is wonderful and very memorable. So as not to repeat, here are just a few specifics and some photos.
reviews.title: This was so memorable!

likes.liked: — Beauty of the grounds, quality of the rooms, and the outstanding service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did the two-resort package: all transfers worked perfectly. (Our flight from the states had to be rerouted, so we arrived at the airport at 10:00pm instead of 1:pm. We called the spa ahead of time and they had transportation waiting for us even though reception was closed. In the room they had a fresh fruit plate waiting.) Takes about 2:15 hrs to travel between resorts in a comfortable van. The free meals with the package are whichever meals you decide at the time you checkout.
reviews.title: Wonderful designs, relaxing and terrific staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The open-to-the-outside shower is a delight. Total privacy facing a garden. You don't just have two sinks in the bathroom, you have two separate vanities on opposite sides of the shower.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: The beach is powder-fine sand. The sunbeds have cushions and are on soft, plush grass with no burrs or bugs. During July the resort is very uncrowded, as is the whole beach. There are some nice breakers in the surf and you can check out a boogie board from the office.
reviews.title: Beautiful, peaceful - perefect

likes.liked: — New, clean and perfectly put together
likes.disliked: — Food could do with improvement (less is more....unless you are from certain parts of the world!!!)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food is extraordinary; very fresh seafood. We usually stay at all-inclusive resorts, but the prices here are so low that cost was not remotely a consideration. Beer was three dollars. A good wine: $25 a bottle. Free breakfast (hot meals also available for a charge) is from 7-10am, lunch 12-3pm, dinner 6-9pm. Dinner entree prices are from $10-$18. Selection includes chicken, seafood, delicious filet mignon, pasta, and vegetarian dishes. The special is always superb. Appetizers, soup, salad, and desserts are equally inexpensive. The waitstaff is very attentive and friendly. For lunch, you must try the grilled chicken sandwich.
reviews.title: beautiful, peaceful, perfect

likes.liked: — the view and the comfy bed and the outdoor shower
likes.disliked: — our villa was right next to the restaurant, but it was still fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I traveled all the way from Russia, where we live, to visit Xandari by the Pacific. I am the owner and partner of a dozen travel agencies in Russia and the former Soviet Union, and have traveled all over the world.
reviews.title: Best hotel I've ever visited

reviews.text: Xandari by the Pacific is definitely one of the best hotels I have ever visited. The location and beach are absolutely beautiful! The design, colors, art and architecture are gorgeous! Attention to detail is given in everything.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is warm, friendly and very helpful. The hotel manager took especially good care of us. She was always available to us and to every guest, always making sure everyone was enjoying their stay. She must never stop working!
reviews.title: Incredible place to stay

likes.liked: — There is no where that you can find accomodations so comfortable and beautiful.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recommend this resort to anyone who wants first class elegance and service at very affordable rates. I would travel from across the world to stay at this resort.
reviews.title: Very Relaxing Vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While this hotel has a marvellous location, 2 major problems currently exist that will prevent me from returning anytime soon.
reviews.title: fantastic new resort
ovwe the top
reviews.text: My wife and my 2 -1/2 year old daughter spent 5 days here and we cannot stop thinking about our stay. The villas are over the top and the spa is brand new and we felt like we were in a private hotel. The beach is amazing and the staff was great. The hotel was half full so we had the beach, pool and restaurants practically to ourselves, not that if it was full it would have been crowded. They have thought of everything and the villas are stunning. We even found so children everyday for our daughter to play with either on the beach or at the hotel. If you compare the price to the carribean, its a steal.. for costa rica its a little pricey but worth it

reviews.title: Paradise Dream
reviews.text: My girlfriends and I spent our 50th birthday celebration at the Xandari in January. We had a wonderful experience, thanks to the excellent staff. I had pre-arranged to surprise my friends with cake and champagne, and Shannon knew me by name when we checked in. A delicious birthday cake and a wonderful bottle of bubbly arrived in short order. The rooms were spotless, the staff discreet, and the small private resort, although fully booked, seemed to be just for us. Melania (sp?) took care of our every need. The views out of the villas are gorgeouse, and they literally open onto a deserted beach. The beds seemed a little hard at first, but they must have been good, because 4 crotchety old women had no complaints. The only problem we had the whole trip was a malfunctioning air conditioner, and we reported it early one morning, and as we were leaving breakfast, we saw a crew bringing in a new unit. The resort is sort of out-of-the-way, but that is what we were looking for. I'm afraid this may change soon, as our guide was telling of big development plans for the area, what a shame. GO NOW, while you can get the full experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We celebrated our 5th wedding anniversary at Xandari by the Pacific and it was a Dream. From the time we arrived in the wee hours in the morning until we left (sad to say) the service was superb. All the needs we require were met by the friendly and welcoming staff. We will be back for sure.
reviews.title: Luxury Villas on the Beach
beautiful Xandari on the Pacific
reviews.text: As residents of Costa Rica for 9 years, (Originally from New York City) we have stayed at the original XANDARI--in the mountains of Alajuela. It has repeatedly been our pick and recommendation to all of our friends and clients and in fact, we have a hard time getting them to go anywhere else, after they have experienced this luxury, tropical oasis. We thought nothing could be more beautiful, until the Dynamic Broudy Husband and Wife Team opened Xandari, right on the beach overlooking the Pacific. Sherrill, A California Architect has carefully designed every vista and interior detail with comfort and beauty in mind. While his talented wife and artist, Charlene completed this feast for the eyes with her paintings, tapestries and mosaics. And their not finished yet! with the spa due to open for the high season.

description: Perfectly situated on Costa Rica’s Pacific Coast along Playa Esterillos Este, between Jaco Beach and Quepos, Alma del Pacifico is a luxury Costa Rica hotel featuring beachfront Caribbean hotel rooms and suites, a three-meal restaurant, full-service spa and a variety of exciting vacation activities. With distinct architecture and art, an extensive array of amenities and superb personal service, Alma del Pacifico Hotel is the premier luxury hotel in Costa Rica.
